insert into mw_linkflow_census_report (time,assets_name,interface_name,acceptFlow_max,acceptFlow_avg,sendingFlow_max, sendingFlow_avg,assetsId,type,modification_date,save_time,acceptFlow_min,acceptFlow_total,sendingFlow_min,sendingFlow_total,send_max_value_time,send_min_value_time,accept_max_value_time,accept_min_value_time) values
( #{list.time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.acceptFlowMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.acceptFlowAvg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.sendingFlowMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.sendingFlowAvg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.assetsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{list.saveTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{list.acceptFlowMin}, #{list.acceptTotalFlow}, #{list.sendingFlowMin}, #{list.sendTotalFlow}, #{list.sendMaxValueTime}, #{list.sendMinValueTime}, #{list.acceptMaxValueTime}, #{list.acceptMinValueTime} )

INSERT INTO mw_diskuse_condition_report( assets_name ,ip_address ,type_name ,disk_total ,disk_free ,disk_max_value ,disk_min_value ,disk_avg_value ,disk_use ,disk_usable ,assetsId ,type ,update_time ,update_success ) VALUES
( #{list.assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.diskTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.diskFree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.diskMaxValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.diskMinValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.diskAvgValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.diskUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.diskUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.assetsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{list.updateSuccess,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} )

INSERT INTO `mw_mpls_history_report`(`send_data`,accept_data, `save_time`,link_name,sort_send_data,sort_accept_data) VALUES (#{sendData},#{acceptData}, #{saveTime},#{name},#{sortSendData},#{sortAcceptData});

mapper.select: SELECT assetsId assetsId, host_id hostId, asset_name assetName, ip, item_name itemName, max_value 'maxValue', min_value minValue, avg_value avgValue, out_interface_avg_value outInterfaceAvgValue, sort_last_avg_value sortLastAvgValue, interface_name interfaceName, disk_name diskName, save_time saveTime FROM mw_runstate_daily WHERE save_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND assetsId IS NOT NULL

SELECT assetsId assetsId, host_id hostId, asset_name assetName, ip, item_name itemName, max_value 'maxValue', min_value minValue, avg_value avgValue, out_interface_avg_value outInterfaceAvgValue, sort_last_avg_value sortLastAvgValue, interface_name interfaceName, disk_name diskName, save_time saveTime FROM mw_runstate_weekly WHERE week_date = #{weekDate} AND assetsId IS NOT NULL

SELECT assetsId assetsId, host_id hostId, asset_name assetName, ip, item_name itemName, max_value 'maxValue', min_value minValue, avg_value avgValue, out_interface_avg_value outInterfaceAvgValue, sort_last_avg_value sortLastAvgValue, interface_name interfaceName, disk_name diskName, save_time saveTime FROM mw_runstate_daily WHERE save_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND assetsId IS NOT NULL and item_name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `mw_mplshistory_daily`(`send_data`,accept_data, `save_time`,link_name,sort_send_data,sort_accept_data,update_success) VALUES (#{sendData},#{acceptData}, #{saveTime},#{name},#{sortSendData},#{sortAcceptData},#{updateSuccess});

INSERT INTO mw_mplshistory_weekly (link_name, save_time, send_data, accept_data, week_date, update_success ) VALUES
( #{list.linkName}, #{list.saveTime}, #{list.send}, #{list.accept}, #{list.weekData}, #{list.updateSuccess} )

INSERT INTO mw_mplshistory_monthly (link_name, save_time, send_data, accept_data, month_date, update_success ) VALUES
( #{list.linkName}, #{list.saveTime}, #{list.send}, #{list.accept}, #{list.monthDate}, #{list.updateSuccess} )
mapper.select:
select sort_send_data sendData,sort_accept_data acceptData,link_name linkName from mw_mplshistory_daily where update_success = 1 and save_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and link_name = #{linkName}

select send_data sendData,accept_data acceptData,link_name linkName from mw_mplshistory_daily where update_success = 1 and save_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and link_name = #{linkName}

select send_data send,accept_data accept from mw_mplshistory_weekly where update_success = 1 and week_date = #{weekDate}
and link_name = #{linkName}

select send_data send,accept_data accept from mw_mplshistory_monthly where update_success = 1 and month_date = #{monthDate}
and link_name = #{linkName}
